content: te | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the employment in local timezone | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Communication Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | type | `'string'` | Type of communication channel. e.g. Address / Mobile / Tel | | subType | `'string'` | Subtype of communication channel. e.g. Work / Home | | value | `'string'` | Value of the channel. e.g. Full Address / Phone Number | | priority | `'number'` | Priority of the channel. | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the validity of the channel in local timezone | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the validity of the channel in local timezone | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Statistics Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | rank | `'string'` | Rank of the crew | | type | `'string'` | Type of statistics. e.g. FlightHour / Dutytime / Resttime / Landing / TotalFlightHour | | subtype | `'string'` | Subtype of statistics if applicable. e.g. For Landing Domestic / International | | value | `'number'` | Value of the metric (Equ, FlightHour, DutyTime, TotalEqu, TotalFlightHour, TotalDutyTime in minutes, EquCycle, Landing, TotalEquCycle, TotalLanding in numbers)| | period | `'string'` | Period of the statistics. e.q. November 2022 | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the measurement of the metric in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the measurement of the metric in UTC | | mean | `'number'` | Mean of statistics (Equ, FlightHour, DutyTime, TotalEqu, TotalFlightHour, TotalDutyTime in minutes, EquCycle, Landing, TotalEquCycle, TotalLanding in numbers) | | median | `'number'` | Median of statistics (Equ, FlightHou
